name: Network Optimization
description: WebWaka Digital Operating System - Network Optimization Agent (Agent 40) CDN Implementation, Bandwidth Optimization, Compression, and Intelligent Routing  This agent provides comprehensive network performance optimization including CDN implementation, bandwidth optimization, data compression, intelligent routing, and Ubuntu philosophy integration for community-centered network performance.  Features: - CDN implementation and management for African infrastructure - Bandwidth optimization and intelligent traffic routing - Data compression and content optimization - Network latency reduction and connection optimization - Ubuntu philosophy integration for community-centered networking - African infrastructure optimization for mobile and low-bandwidth environments - Real-time network performance monitoring and optimization
dependencies: from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Tuple, Any, Union
